content: Thanks for the recommendations! I'll definitely add them to my TBR list. I'm excited to discuss "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo" with my friend and explore more books like it. By the way, I've been thinking about my reading habits and how I want to track my progress. I recently started a book journal to reflect on what I've learned and identify patterns in my tastes and preferences. Do you have any tips on how to make the most out of a book journal?
